Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine rose-pink; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Andrias. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roan Museum, MGR P.16009.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (24)
